name: Pekan Raya Stardew Valley
set-up: fallFest/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Fair/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Vincent true -3 0 2 5000 3 0 2 5000/advancedMove Jas true 2 0 4 5000 -2 0 4 5000/advancedMove Marnie true -2 0 4 5000 2 0 2 5000/advancedMove Abigail true 4 6000 5 0 0 3 2 6000 0 -3 -5 0/advancedMove Robin true 0 1 1 5000 0 -2 3 5000 0 1 1 5000/animate Sebastian false true 200 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 20 22 22 23/addTemporaryActor BabyPig 32 32 65 68 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor Pig 32 32 65 70 3 false Animal/addTemporaryActor White_Chicken 16 16 59 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor Brown_Chicken 16 16 61 67 2 false Animal/addTemporaryActor White_Cow 32 32 59 72 0 false Animal/addTemporaryActor BabyWhite_Cow 32 32 61 72 1 false Animal/advancedMove BabyPig true 0 1 3 5000 0 -1 0 7000/advancedMove Pig true 3 5000 0 1 1 5000 0 -1 3 5000/advancedMove White_Chicken true 1 0 2 7000 -1 0 2 10000/animate Brown_Chicken false true 500 16 17/viewport 22 22 true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear/pause 2000/playerControl fair
Abigail_spouse: Aku mengalahkan semua permainan ini tahun lalu!$h
Leah_spouse: Aku mempelajari semua teknik Robin setahun ini, tapi dia selalu selangkah lebih maju!
Maru_spouse: mumph... Ini satu-satunya kesempatanku buat makan roti lapis barbecue.
Haley_spouse: Apa kamu ingat untuk membawa barang terbaik kita untuk pajangan? Semoga kita menang tahun ini.
Sebastian_spouse: Hei, @. Aku mau ngobrol dulu sama Sam. Bersenang-senanglah.
Sam_spouse: Sebastian masih seperti dulu. Apa kau bersenang-senang?
Alex_spouse: Aku mau ngobrol dulu sama teman lama... Bersenang-senanglah.
Harvey_spouse: Aku akan menunggu disini sampai kamu siap pulang...
Elliott_spouse: Aroma yang mengiurkan ini menarik perhatianku, tapi saus lezat inilah yang membungkam jiwaku... *sendawa*$s
Abigail: Aku sudah memenangkan semua permainan ini... sekarang apa?
Robin: Pahat kayu adalah tradisi kuno, oleh karena itu aku bangga bisa melakukannya.$h
Demetrius: Robin sangat tekun dalam bekerja... Dia pantas mendapat pujian.
Maru: *sruput* mmm... saus barbecue ini sangat lezat.$h
Sebastian: Hari ini sangat ramai... Aku akan disini saja.
Pierre: Tokoku menjual produk kualitas terbaik di seluruh lembah. Silahkan, lihat saja pajanganku kalau tidak percaya!
Caroline: Pierre sangat serius dengan kontes ini. Dia sudah menyiapkan produk terbaik selama berminggu-minggu.#$e#Hei, semoga kamu beruntung juga kalau ikut!
Linus: Hewan-hewan ini tidak pernah menilai orang dari penampilan. Beda dengan manusia.
Alex: Aku terlalu banyak main 'uji kekuatan' dan sekarang tanganku terasa seperti karet.
George: Hmm... ada kalkun panggang? Festival ini tidak buruk juga.$h
Evelyn: Semoga Gus menambah hidangan vegetarian juga. Sate zucchini, mungkin?
Lewis: Baiklah @, inilah hari yang ditunggu-tunggu... Festival terbesar tahun ini, 'Pekan Raya Stardew Valley'.#$b#Kalau mau ikut memamerkan pajangan, sudah kusiapkan satu stand kosong untukmu. Beritahu kalau kamu sudah menata pajanganmu biar aku bisa menilainya.
Clint: Kadang aku muak dengan pekerjaanku, tapi kadang aku juga bangga dengannya.#$b#Ini adalah beberapa karya terbaikku. Semoga kamu suka.
Emily: Kau tahu, aku pasti bisa jadi badut yang lucu. Sepertinya aku kehilangan kesempatanku.
Penny: Aku memenangkan 'roda peluang' 10 kali berturut-turut dan sekarang bapak itu melarangku main lagi...$s
Pam: Sebaiknya kamu buru-buru, nak... Sebelum si tua Pam ini menangkap semua ikannya! Hehe.$h
Haley: Apa kamu sudah ke peramal? Stand-nya ada di pemakaman.#$e#Aku sudah kesana... dia memberitahuku sesuatu... yang menarik. *hihi*$h
Jodi: Badutnya terlihat kurang ceria... Sepertinya Pak Lewis memotong anggaran badut tahun ini.
Kent: Aku menunggu badutnya untuk bertingkah lucu.#$e#Benar-benar mengecewakan.
Sam: Hei @. Kamu bersenang-senang?#$e#Permainan ketapelnya cukup menyenangkan, apalagi kalau jago, kamu bisa dapat banyak star token.
Leah: Aku sangat mengagumi teknik berkayu Robin. Aku sering menggunakan teknik yang sama dalam karyaku.
Shane: Semua hewan ini sangat ramah dan suka di elus-elus.
Marnie: Aku sudah berusaha, tapi sepertinya pajanganku akan kalah dengan Pierre.$s#$e#Mungkin jurinya akan memberiku poin tambahan untuk keju raksasaku.
Elliott: Aku mencoba membujuk Gus agar mau membagikan resep sausnya, tapi dia tetap kukuh.
Gus: Makanlah sebanyak yang kau mau! Hari ini semuanya gratis... berterima kasihlah pada Pak Lewis.$h#$e#Oh! Jangan lupa cicipi juga saus rahasiaku di sebelah sana.
Dwarf: Di permukaan sedang hujan katamu? *hahh*#$e#Hujan... Itu hal mistis bagi kami. Banyak dari kami yang tidak pernah melihat hujan di hidupnya.
Wizard: Welwick dan aku sudah lama saling kenal... dia penyihir yang hebat, dan teman yang baik.#$e#...#$e#Badut itu... Sepertinya aku kenal dia dari suatu tempat.#$e#Di sekolah ilusi kah? Atau mungkin di Karnaval Rahasia? Hmm...
Harvey: Saat keluar kantorku tadi pagi, Gus sedang membakar daging rusuk... Hii.$s#$e#Membayangkannya saja sudah membuatku mual...$11
Sandy: Aku dengar sedang hujan di rumah. Apa karena itu kamu datang kesini?$h#$e#Aku jadi merindukan hujan...$s
Marlon: Pedang buatan Clint semakin tajam tiap tahun.#$e#Harganya juga...
Willy: Apa kamu ikut pameran, @? Ini kesempatanmu untuk menunjukkan produk terbaik dari Kebun %farm!
Leo: Haha! Aku tidak pernah melihat yang seperti ini sebelumnya...$h
set-up_y2: fallFest/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Fair2/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/animate Sebastian false true 200 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 19 20 21 21 21 21 20 22 22 23/animate Penny false true 1000 34/positionOffset Penny 0 24/advancedMove Marnie true 2 3500 3 300 -2 0 3 300 4 4000 1 300 2 0 2 5750/advancedMove Abigail true 4 6000 3 300 -1 0 3 300 4 4500 1 300 2 0 1 300 4 4750 3 300 -1 0 3 250 4 1000/advancedMove Maru true 2 8000 1 300 2 0 0 3 2 0 1 2500 2 3000 1 3000 2 300 3 300 -3 0 0 5 2 300 3 4000 2 300 1 3000 4 300 0 -5 1 0 0 -3 -2 0 3 3000 2 4000/advancedMove Linus true 2 7000 1 300 2 0 1 250 2 6000 3 300 -2 0 3 300 2 1000/advancedMove Demetrius true 1 6500 2 300 0 3 3 0 1 300 4 5500 3 300 -3 0 0 -3 4 300 1 2000/advancedMove Jas true 3 6000 4 250 0 -2 -4 0 3 300 2 5000 3 300 -2 0 0 4 2 300 1 5000 4 300 0 -4 2 0 1 300 2 4000 1 300 4 0 0 2 2 300 3 1000/advancedMove Leo true 2 7500 1 300 2 0 0 2 2 300 3 5000 4 300 0 -2 -2 0 3 300 2 1000/advancedMove Pam true 3 7750 4 300 0 -1 -2 0 0 -1 4 5000 1 300 2 350 0 1 2 0 0 1 2 300 3 1000/advancedMove Gus true 4 4300 1 300 1 0 1 300 4 3500 3 350 -2 0 3 350 4 4600 1 300 1 0 4 1000/advancedMove Robin true 4 4500 3 300 -1 0 0 -2 4 300 1 5000 2 300 0 2 1 0 1 300 4 1000/advancedMove Leah true 3 6300 4 300 0 -1 -1 0 3 300 2 5000 3 300 -1 0 0 1 2 300 1 5000 4 300 0 -1 1 0 1 300 2 4500 1 300 1 0 0 1 2 300 3 1250/advancedMove Elliott true 2 6800 3 2500 2 8000 3 2000 2 300/positionOffset Shane 12 -16/positionOffset Vincent 0 -12/positionOffset Kent? Abigail_spouse_y2: Aren't these weapons cool? I might have to bring one of these home with us today.$0
Leah_spouse_y2: Hey, Robin is teaching me some innovative techniques this year.#$e#I'll have to show you later...$1
Maru_spouse_y2: I hope we win the grange display contest! You worked really hard this year.
Penny_spouse_y2: Come here, sit for a while! There's space on the bench for the both of us.$1
Haley_spouse_y2: It's a little funny seeing Alex stuff his face. He seems to be doing well.#$e#I hope we win the grange display contest this year!$1
Emily_spouse_y2: Sandy traveled all the way from Calico Desert to be here today.#$b#It's not very often that I get to see her!
Sebastian_spouse_y2: That lady in the graveyard predicted our future...$0#$b#Apparently, we're destined to live a happy life together.$1
Sam_spouse_y2: Hey, are you enjoying the festival? I'll be rooting for our grange display!$0#$e#Psst... If you're going to bet your tokens on the wheel... bet on green!$0
Alex_spouse_y2: Did you eat yet? There's almost too much to go around!$0#$e#I already ate three sandwiches... Mmm... that sauce...
Harvey_spouse_y2: Hi, honey. Good luck today in the competition. I just know you're going to shine!$0
Elliott_spouse_y2: Victory! I achieved a score of '216' with five fish caught... a new personal best!$1#$e#Now, I must choose a fitting prize to purchase for you with these star tokens...$0
Shane_spouse_y2: I might ask you to watch the animals soon so I can grab some food.$0
Abigail_y2: This blade is so elegant. Maybe some day I'll have enough money to buy one!$0
Robin_y2: If you want to master the wood, you have to think like a tree...$0
Demetrius_y2: Sheep have remarkable memory capabilities... retaining familiarity with both fellow sheep and humans...$0#$e#They even form friendships, mirroring the close bonds we humans cultivate with one another!$1
Maru_y2: There's so much to do! I don't know where to begin.$0
Sebastian_y2: That lady told me my fortune. I don't know what to make of it...$0
Linus_y2: Animals are kind of like little people... they also have feelings and emotions.$0
Pierre_y2: I'm confident that I'll emerge victorious in this year's grange display competition!$1
Caroline_y2: Some of the produce in our grange display came from my little greenhouse. We've been carefully growing this stuff all year!$0
Alex_y2: Every hundred rounds of the strength game I win, I eat another BBQ sandwich.$0
George_y2: %George is on the verge of falling asleep.
Evelyn_y2: Hee hee... Maybe I should start a collection of clown figurines...
Lewis_y2: Greetings, @! The 'Stardew Valley Fair' is finally here and the crowd is growing by the minute.#$b#Just like last year, I've set up an empty grange display for you. Speak with me when you're ready to commence the judging.
Clint_y2: It's heartening to see others take an interest in my work. Makes me feel like I'm doing something good in the world.#$e#I finished some of these pieces just last week. Please inspect them closely, I stand behind my work!
Penny_y2: *phew* After being on my feet all day, it's nice to finally take a moment to relax.$0
Pam_y2: Life don't get much better than this, kid!$1
Emily_y2: When Sandy and I were kids, we joked about running away from it all and joining the circus.$0#$e#I don't think we would've actually gone through with it, but it's fun to imagine.$1
Haley_y2: I'm trying to maintain a diet this fall... but I can't resist these juicy burgers!$h
Jodi_y2: Oh no. Who's responsible for littering here?$2#$e#Every year we get some tourists that don't respect our town...$2
Kent_y2: *chuckle* My son has a knack for accuracy. I wonder if he got it from me.$1
Marlon_y2: I'm in the market for a new weapon. I wonder if I could negotiate a trade with Clint...
Sam_y2: Ugh... I gambled and lost it all to the spinning wheel...$2#$e#I should've went with green.$0
Leah_y2: I think Robin and I make a pretty good team, don't you think?
Shane_y2: The animals have been given their favorite foods, so they're happy.$h#$e#Feel free to pet them, they won't bite.
Marnie_y2: My animals had a successful year! I'm hoping the high-quality produce will impress the judges.$1#$e#How's your grange display, @? It's your moment to showcase the fruits of your labor.$0
Elliott_y2: Ah, don't mind the smell... I just emerged from the fishing booth with a sizable haul!$1#$e#Now, I must decide what to do with all these star tokens...$0
Gus_y2: Working four grills simultaneously is hard work! There's a large and hungry crowd to cater to today.$0#$e#I put a little dash of my zesty sauce in each patty. *wink*
Dwarf_y2: I was curious about this human gathering... $0#$e#Please don't tell anyone. I'm hoping to remain hidden here...$0
Wizard_y2: If you wish to peer through the mists of tomorrow, speak to my colleague Welwick.$0#$b#She has an uncommon gift...#$e#That young man by the tree seemed intrigued by his reading, but even with my powers, I cannot probe the innermost secrets of the heart...$0
Harvey_y2: I'm astonished by the level of craftsmanship on display here. Some people are so talented!$0
Sandy_y2: The Stardew Valley community is truly one-of-a-kind...$0
Jas_y2: Mooo! Moooooo!$1#$e#I'm trying to talk to the baby cows.$0
Vincent_y2: Can I play the slingshot game again, Dad!? Please?$0
Willy_y2: I managed to catch several iridium-quality beauties, just in time for this year's fair!$1#$e#After our grange displays are judged I'll have to try my hand at the fishing game tent.$0
Leo_y2: I'm making friends with these birds!$1
